summary: Completed comprehensive testing of wedding website template modernization with config system and theme selector. All 10 features tested successfully including config-driven content, 5-theme selector, theme switching with color palette changes, password protection, mobile responsiveness, and inspiration page navigation.
passed_tests: Config-driven content - couple names 'Jane & John' display correctly in navigation
Config-driven content - wedding date 'December 31, 2025' displays correctly in hero section
Theme selector button visible and clickable at bottom-right corner
Theme selector shows all 5 themes (sage, blush, dustyBlue, gold, lavender) with correct names
Theme switching successfully changes color palette in dresscode section
Color palette verification - Sage theme: Light Sage, Sage, Deep Sage, Cream, Warm Beige, Soft Gold
Color palette verification - Blush theme: Blush, Rose, Dusty Rose, Ivory, Champagne, Mauve
Color palette verification - Gold theme: Champagne, Gold, Antique Gold, Ivory, Cream, Bronze
All 10 sections render correctly (about, place, accommodation, rsvp, dresscode, program, parking, photos, gifts, contacts)
Password protection works with 'wedding25'
URL bypass works with ?access=wedding25
Desktop navigation menu (6 items) working correctly
Mobile responsive menu (10 items) working correctly on 390x844 viewport
Inspiration page navigation and back button working correctly
6 outfit inspiration images loading correctly
All 102 unit tests passing
Theme selector floating button with data-testid='theme-selector-btn'
Each theme option has correct data-testid='theme-{themeName}'
Responsive design working on desktop (1920x1080) and mobile (390x844)
Smooth animations and transitions working
success_percentage: frontend: 100% - All features working perfectly, no issues found
